data.title: Sandy Lam Facts for Kids
data.meta_description: Sandy Lam facts. Sandy Lam, (Chinese: 林憶蓮), is a Hong Kong singer, actress and record producer. She sings in Cantonese, Mandarin, English, and Japanese.
